headline: Alphabet Sits At Center Of AI And Robotaxi Shifts
summary: Alphabet (NasdaqGS:GOOGL) has reportedly reached an agreement for Apple to use its Gemini AI model in the next version of Siri. The arrangement would involve Apple paying Alphabet to power some Siri features with Gemini. Separately, Alphabet’s Waymo unit clarified that its robotaxis are never remotely driven and that remote staff only provide high level guidance. Waymo’s clarification is aimed at regulators and the public as scrutiny of autonomous vehicle safety and oversight continues. For...

headline: Berkshire Hathaway Bets on the New York Times. Buffett Wins Again.
summary: Warren Buffett has long been a fan of newspapers, so much so that  Apple  even developed a paper-tossing game as an app for the iPhone for a  Berkshire Hathaway  shareholder meeting a few years ago.  Berkshire recently disclosed a new stake in  New York Times  , the publishing company that is thriving in the midst of the traditional-media downturn.  The Oracle of Omaha’s conglomerate said that it had acquired a little more than five million shares of New York Times stock in the fourth quarter.

The Oracle of Omaha’s conglomerate said that it had acquired a little more than five million shares of New York Times stock in the fourth quarter.

headline: Australian Motoring Service Adds Support for Apple's Roadside Assistance via Satellite through Infobip
